lines.gurmukhi: nwihn AnUp rUp icqvY ikau icMqwmix lony hY n loien jo lwln iblokIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Naahin Anoop Roop Chitavai Kiu Chintaamani , Lonay Hai N Loin Jo Laalan Bilokeeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: My looks are not attractive. Then how can I remember and conceive the beautiful? Lord the fulfiller of desires Lord? My eyes are not good looking; then how can I see the glimpse of that beloved Lord?

lines.gurmukhi: rsnw rsIlI nwih bynqI bKwnau kYsy suriq n sÍnn bcn mDokIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Rasanaa Raseelee Naahi Baynatee Bakhaanau Kaisay , Surati N Sravanan Bachan Madhokeeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: My tongue is not ambrosial. Then how can I make an effective request to my beloved? I do not have such power of hearing that I can enjoy the honey-like words of my beloved Lord?

lines.gurmukhi: AMg AMghIn dIn kYsy br mwl krau msqk nwih Bwg piRX pg DokIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Ang Angaheen Deen Kaisay Bar Maal Karau , Masatak Naahi Bhaag Priy Pag Dhokeeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: I am weak and imperfect in every part of my body. Then how can I make a superior rosary of remembrance of my Lord's name? I have no I can bank upon to wash the feet of my beloved.

lines.gurmukhi: syvk sÍBwv nwih phuc n skau syv nwihn pRqIq pRB pRBqw smokIAY ]640]
lines.transliteration_english: Sayvak Svabhaav Naahi Pahouch N Sakau Sayva , Naahin Prateet Prabh Prabhataa Samokeeai ?640?

Shabad OS B.translation: I do not have the temperament of service in my heart; so I cannot reach for the service of my beloved. Nor do I have that devotion through which I can become one with the greatness of the dear Lord. (The greatness of the Lord may reside in me.)  (640)
